thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 2 of 658
thread.title: Peterson

author: Peterson
title: Peterson
text: Compared to brick and mortar opticians, the prices are unbeatable. However, they lack the ability to upload your picture along with your pupillary distance (PD) in order to gauge the fit so you must be careful to pay attention to the frames' dimensions to double check the fit to your face. Any vendor that allows me to bypass Luxxotica's monopolistic pricing is a plus for me. The biggest downside is Frames Direct's aggressive upselling of antireflective (AR) coating which has demonstrably little advantage for the wearer. I'm an engineer with an Optical Physics background so I think I know what I'm talking about. Anti-scratch and polarized - well that's something worth the money depending on your uses. Bottom line - I plan to purchase from them again.
